document.full_text: stocks that outperform in a weak economy helped the dow and s&p 500 eke out gains on thursday as concerns about faltering growth and inflation prompted investors to seek out less volatile names.
document.title: dow, s&p inch up as growth questioned, google off late
lines_and_colors: stocks that outperform in a weak economy helped the dow and s&p 500 eke out gains on thursday as concerns about faltering growth and inflation prompted investors to seek out less volatile names.
